description: Tool to get labels associated with FreeSurfer's parcellation and annotation files.

label_int.title: Label integer
label_int.description: Integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's parcellation.

lab_flag.title: Label flag
lab_flag.description: Return the name of an integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's parcellation.

rank_int.title: Rank integer
rank_int.description: Return the name of ranked integer labeled area from the output of 3dRank or 3dmerge -1rank.

rankmap_file.title: Rank map file
rankmap_file.description: Path to the rank map file.

name.title: Name
name.description: Return entries matching NAME (case insensitive, partial match) from FreeSurfer's FreeSurferColorLUT.txt.

labeltable_file.title: Label table file
labeltable_file.description: Path to the label table file.

surf_annot_cmap.title: Surface annotation CMAP
surf_annot_cmap.description: CMAP file output by FSread_annot's -roi_1D option.

slab_int.title: Surface label integer
slab_int.description: Return the name of an integer labeled area in FreeSurfer's surface-based annotation.

sname_name.title: Surface name
sname_name.description: Return the entries matching NAME (case insensitive, partial match) from the CMAP file.
